text: Dawat e-Islami (Urdu: دَعَوْتُ اسْلَامَى) is a Barelvi Islamic group based in Pakistan. They have multiple Barelvi educational institutions around the world. Dawat e-Islami offers online courses in Barelvi studies and runs a television program, Madani Channel. The group was founded in 1981 by scholars who chose Ilyas Qadri as the main advisor. == Programs == A list of television programs offered by Dawat e-Islami is provided below: * Ghulam Rasool * Kaneez Fatima == References == Category:Sunni organizations Category:Islam in Pakistan
title: Dawat-e-Islami
